content.rendered:
Specifically designed as a reliable and durable public access defibrillator device the AED 3 features Zolls Uni-padz and Real CPR Help to assist the minimally trained user during the resuscitation process.

Features:

  • An 8-second shock delivery between CPR cycles (with an additional 5 secs to ensure the patient is clear before shock)
  • Two-piece style Uni-padz suitable for adult and paediatric patients
  • Uni-padz complete with depth compression gauge and clothing shears
  • Audible metronome set at 100 compressions per minute
  • Screen displays shock delivered and elapsed rescue time
  • Easily switch to paediatric mode with a single button
  • Simple, intuitive operation for minimally trained users
  • Long-lasting battery and Uni-padz each with a 5-year shelf life for lower long-run costs
  • Automatic weekly and monthly self-checks
  • Internal memory saves 120min of rescue data including the surrounding sounds for in-depth post-event analysis
  • Wifi connected for easier management and reporting on the status of the AED 3

Supplied With:

  • 1 Pair of Electrodes

Specifications:

  • Dimensions (H*D*W): 12.7 cm * 23.6 cm * 24.7 cm
  • Weight: 2.5kg
  • Waveform Analysis: Rectilinear Biphasic
  • Energy Output Range: Automatic Preprogrammed Steps (Adult – 120J, 150J, 200J) (Paed – 50J, 75J, 85J)
  • Environmental Resistance: IP55 Rating
  • Electrode Lead Wire Length: 1.4m
  • CPR Rate: Variable metronome between 60 to 100 cpm (compressions per minute)
  • Internal Memory Capacity: 50min of ECG and CPR recording
  • Power Source: 10 x Type 123 batteries
